page.title: 15Farming.
page.content: Mynydd-y-Gaer is dotted with Hill farms, many being hundreds of uears old. Cefn Carfan Uchaf is one such farm and covers 45 acres. Mr.Griffiths, the farmer, has 40 cows and about 100 sheep. He grows no crops but 15 acres is used for growing hay. The cows graze the remainder whilst the sheep graze the mountain land to the north. Mr. Griffiths has been a farmer all his life and would not consider any other sort of work. He seldom has a holiday because his animals always need his attention. He is concerned about conservation and recently he has planted over 500 young trees on a section of his land. He hopes that his sons will continue to farm the land after him. (Group D.) H.D.
